remarks: Lemma for the ` MblFn ` predicate applied to a mapping operation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Aug-2014.)
statement:
mbfmptcl.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> B ) e. MblFn ) $.
mbfmptcl.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. V ) $.
mbfmptcl $p |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
$d A x $.
$d ph x $.
